thread.title: JPP expected to meet with Giants doctors this week
thread.title_full: JPP expected to meet with Giants doctors this week - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: JPP expected to meet with Giants doctors this week
text:
Bill Kostroun/AP Jason Pierre-Paul injures his hand during a Fourth of July accident. The circus is headed back to East Rutherford.
Sources say that Jason Pierre-Paul, who injured his hand in a Fourth of July fireworks accident, is expected to meet with Giants doctors sometime this week. It will be his first visit with the team since Labor Day, when he first let team doctors check out his mangled hand only to head back home to Florida when the club deemed him not ready to play.
Pierre-Paul may have hinted that a visit is on the horizon early Monday afternoon.
“God is good,” he tweeted simply, although his tweet could have been about anything.
